items.content_html: A lightweight FastAPI micro-service that streams call-transcript chunks to the OpenAI API and returns a real-time judgment on whether the conversation is a vishing (voice-phishing) attempt, plus a confidence score. Stateless, multi-call-aware, and deploys in seconds with Docker or serverless containers
